title: Fiber Jetting
tagline: High-output placement built for long runs and consistent results.
description: Our jetting crews specialize in production-scale fiber placement through conduit systems of all sizes. From single-duct metro runs to multi-path campus distributions, we deliver cable safely, efficiently, and on schedule. Every run is monitored for tension and pressure to protect cable integrity from start to finish.
features: Production-grade jetting equipment for runs up to 15,000+ feet
Pre-jet conduit inspection and pathway verification
Multi-count cable handling from 12 to 864 fibers
Tight bend radius navigation without cable damage
Coordinated reel staging and logistics planning

title: Fiber Splicing
tagline: Clean trays, clear labeling, and documentation that's ready for closeout.
description: Precision matters when fibers meet. Our splicing teams deliver consistently low-loss fusion splices with organized tray routing, permanent labeling, and OTDR documentation on every closure. When we hand off a splice, it's ready for the customer to inspect and the project to close out.
features: Core-alignment fusion splicing with sub-0.05dB average loss
Clean tray organization with color-coded routing
Permanent labeling on every closure and tray
Full OTDR testing and documentation per strand
Closeout-ready packages with test results and photos
